name: remind-me
description: bot to remind you of Salah

scripts.services:install: cd services/translation-service && npm install && cd ../prayer-times-service && npm install
scripts.services:build: cd services/translation-service && npm run build && cd ../prayer-times-service && npm run build
scripts.microservices:dev: concurrently "npm run services:translation" "npm run services:prayer-times" "npm run dev" "npm run webapp" --names "translation,prayer-times,bot,webapp" --prefix-colors "green,blue,cyan,magenta"

author: AbdulQader Qassab
